original: intros g f ptd H1 H2. unfold Riemann_sum. induction ptd as [| h t IHptd]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite Riemann_sum_cons. unfold plus. rewrite IHptd. unfold scal. unfold Riemann_sum in IHptd. apply Rle_trans with (norm (scal (SF_h t - fst h) (g (snd h))) + foldr plus zero (pairmap (fun x y : R * R => scal (fst y - fst x) (g (snd y))) (SF_h t, zero) t)). + apply Rmult_le_compat_l. * apply norm_ge_0. * apply H2. split. ++ simpl. apply nth_In. apply Nat.lt_0_succ. ++ unfold SF_h. simpl. apply le_n_S. apply le_0_n. + apply norm_triangle.
